## Workspace.newBlock() method

Obtain a newly created block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newBlock(prototypeName: string, opt_id?: string): Block;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prototypeName | string | Name of the language object containing type-specific functions for this block. |
|  opt\_id | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional ID. Use this ID if provided, otherwise create a new ID. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Block](./blockly.block_class.md)

The created block.
